TopicTitle: Looks like the sciente boffins at KSP have decided it's "Build your rocket outside" day.

Articles.Content: I reverted to VAB and ended up "outside" thanks to some strange glitch. Luckily it was a nice sunny day.
I've seen a few posts like this before... Squad, a bugfix is in order, don't you think? Or maybe a bug-war?
Did it allow you to build 'outside the box'?
People in glass VABs shouldn't throw stones.
I'll have you know, it's not easy getting those cloaking devices to work right on an entire building like that.

Actually they put those big glass panels in so the bosses could keep an eye on that maniac truck/lorry driver who feels he must constantly race around the grounds at unsafe speeds.

*edit*

...and I want to see an update inside the VAB, all those Kerbal engineers getting mowed down by moving vehicles; Should at least show them splatted or limping around or something.

...and I want to see an update inside the VAB, all those Kerbal engineers getting mowed down by moving vehicles; Should at least show them splatted or limping around or something.

KERBAL SPACE PROGRAM: ULTIMATE SHOWDOWN EDITION

Rated M for Mature
Sounds like you haven't upgraded your VAB from level -1.
Sunny day? I think you mean Foggy day.
